about_the_game:
Toy Empires is a unique fast-paced, micro-management-free real-time strategy game. All you have to do is make the purest decisions and games!
Choose which power you like in the world of modern history: make the Ming Dynasty invincible, France sweep across the European continent, or rewrite history and let Byzantium revive Rome? On the battlefield of toys and pieces of paper, anything is possible.
How are workers allocated? What policy is enacted? Is it the military-first policy or economic development? Is it a defensive counterattack or a military force to suppress the situation? These are all questions. ——But it doesn’t matter, because there is no only solution. Only by using tricks can you become victorious!

In Toy Empires you can:
  • - Real-time battles in multiple vivid and beautiful toy papercraft scenes, each map has a unique gameplay mechanism.
  • - Use multiple historical forces from the 13th to 18th centuries to fight, including the Ming Empire, the Kingdom of France, the Byzantine Empire, etc.
  • - Use the historical arms of each force to fight, each of which has unique characteristics.
  • - Develop technology on the rich technology tree and unlock various new technologies to strengthen your power.
  • - Construct a variety of unique buildings to help you defeat your enemies.
  • - Promulgate various historical policies to guide your people.
  • - Cross-platform battles with friends.
